attributes.action: review  the rules on voting, at present you do not need your poll card with you when visiting a polling station. To prevent Election fraud, we would like to see changes to this law so that only those attending with a polling card can legally cast their vote .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live in Peterborough where we have had major problems with Election fraud. At present the adopted system does little to prevent a person voting illegally as you do not need your polling card when casting your vote. With a known history of Election fraud in the city of  Peterborough, I and others  strongly feel that this  process can be avoided if simple changes are made to the Law. Please notify your friends and colleagues. Together, we will make a difference.
